name: Parker Hurley
text: Goa Tetes is one of the coolest waterfalls I’ve ever experienced. It’s a collection of waterfalls and caves that you can explore (and climb if you’re careful and capable.) This place scratched every itch that lingered from childhood - …

name: Wahyu Tri Ananda
text: Air terjun kecil dengan bentuk yang unik serta goa-goa dengan air yang menetes dan sangat indah. Saya terakhir kemari saat tahun 2016, semoga di sini tidak ada tiket-tiket liar yang tidak jelas seperti air terjun di sebelah.

name: leotrails
text: It is a captivating spot known for its stunning rock formations and a beautiful waterfall. The trail here is not well-defined, so it's essential to follow the signboards to stay on track and be cautious. There are also two routes to take: …

name: Naufalia Faza
text: The view is stunning, but the hike is no easy feet. You’ll walk on a slippery waterfall stream, so make sure to wear proper footwear — rubber sandals are available for rent. I took the Goa Tetes track down, but I didn’t think I could manage …

name: Jason Adams (Jase)
text: Goa Tetes is absolutely awesome what an adventure we had climbing the falls with our guide. Way off the beaten track. I definitely had more fun and took many more photos here than I did at tumpak sewu, what an adventure. You have obviously came here to see tumpak sewu, if you don’t do goa tetes you have missed out big time!

name: Rajeshree Sanyal
text: It is nearly 45 min trek down broken stairs and the same back up, so make sure you have the stamina. But the trip is worth it. It is beautiful and clean, almost untouched! Must visit if you have come as far as Tempuk Sewu.

name: M Farkhan Mubarok
text: Caves drops first discovered by a wood saw in 1969. The name goa drops is used asa location because of its exact position under a waterfall, so many drops in the caverns are derived from the water droplets dripping from the goa ceiling. …

Cepat dan mudah dilakukan, dan Anda tidak memerlukan pemandu. Pintu pertama sudah termasuk pemandu dan makanan, yang menurut saya tidak perlu.

name: Immanuel Ambhara
text: There are many waterfalls in the area that flows down the rock wall. Some are small, some are big. They are pretty. There are caves and natural pools. This place is reachable directly by following the 'Goa Tetes' sign from the main road, or from down the Tumpak Sewu waterfall.
